free_text.Learning outcomes: This course illustrates the structure of genes and the molecular mecanisms of DNA transcription and replication. An objective of the course is the understanding of how genes are regulated and transmitted and how they influence the phenotype of organisms.[br/]Students will exercise reading and oral presentation of scientific articles.
free_text.Content: [li] Molecular properties of nucleic acids.[br/][li] Molecular mechanisms of gene expression.[br/][li] Molecular mechanisms of protein synthesis.[br/][li] Regulation of gene expression in procaryotes and eucaryotes.[br/][li] Mutations and genetic/epigenetic propagation of phenotypes.
